Thought for 6 seconds
torch 2.2.2 is installed correctly, but recent transformers 4.52 requires
the brand-new torch.get_default_device() helper that does not ship
until PyTorch 2.3 (it was removed from the final 2.2 release).

So we have two easy ways forward:

Path	What to do	Pros	Cons
A â€“ pin transformers to 4.38.2	bash pip uninstall transformers -y pip install "transformers==4.38.2"	- Still has all HF pipelines you need
- Fully compatible with torch 2.2.x	One extra pip command
B â€“ monkey-patch	Add
python import torch; torch.get_default_device = lambda: torch.device("cpu")
before you call pipeline()	No re-install	Quick hack; fragile for other libs
Recommendation â†’ Path A (pin transformers).

ðŸ“œ Commands to run (inside review_assistant_env)
pip uninstall transformers -y
pip install "transformers==4.38.2"
